originalText.text: Process is easy to get power of attorney attestation, not crowded. Please note, service is in basement, and Copier available in the basement. Check in kiosk is there, so first come first serve. If you keep your documents as Set A and Set B as mentioned on their kiosk then everything will be done within couple of minutes. You will be asked to switch off the phones and put it in a locker without keys. Would have given 5 star if thereâ€™s a safe place to keep our phones.

originalText.text:
I gave 3 stars with a reason.
Indian embassies around the world can exemplify Indian hospitality, and hiring a branding consultant could aid in realizing this goal within India's current budget on the mission in NY or anywhere else.

Sometimes, offering criticism or not praising also means presenting a solution. Agree?

originalText.text: I needed my minor son's passport to be reissued for emergency travel. The staff were very patient, kind, accommodating and extremely helpful. Could not have had better service. Every member of the team was courteous and explained document requirements and steps very lucidly. Keep up the good work!

text.text: I needed my minor son's passport to be reissued for emergency travel. The staff were very patient, kind, accommodating and extremely helpful. Could not have had better service. Every member of the team was courteous and explained document requirements and steps very lucidly. Keep up the good work!

originalText.text: Do not believe any bad reviews you read around, the staff has changed and these new people are the kindest and most helpful Indians I ever met. The staff is literally spending so much energy to explain simple concepts to people, as we Indians have a habit of repeating the same question expecting a different answer- the staff here is so classy, they patiently kept explaining to at least 4 people while I was waiting. They spend so much of their energy I wouldâ€™ve lost my patience! Love and best wishes to my Indian consulate staff! Very clean and hygienic restrooms too. Indian classiness at its best. Got me emotional and I miss my parents. Letâ€™s throw a Jai Hind in too ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³

originalText.text: As part of my application for my passport renewal, I had to engage with CGNY staff via email, telephone and the PRAMIT platform. The issue was related to clarity about Police Verification. On all occasions, response time was swift, ranging from the same day to 5 working days. The issue was resolved and the support from CGNY was very good. As long as the procedures are followed (CGNY provide detailed guidance for all its services), you will face no issues.
